Habitual.description: Ride 10 km in a single activity 3 days in a row.

Addicted.description: Ride a lap 7 days in a row.

Working from Home.description: Ride 10 km in a single activity 14 days in a row.

You're Popular.description: Receive 10 Ride Ons in one ride.
You're Popular.image_description: Zwifter with A stylized thumbs-up "Ride On!" icon.

Ride On.image_description: A stylized thumbs-up "Ride On!" icon with flame coming out of the thumb.

Big Fan.image_description: A stylized thumbs-up "Ride On!" icon with flames covering the hand.

Fan Club.image_description: A stylized thumbs-up "Ride On!" icon showing with the hand engulfed with flame.

Paparazzi.image_description: Cameras on a person riding a bike.

Into the Wind.image_description: Person riding a bike on road making a U-turn.

Sweat!.image_description: A person riding a bike crossing a finish line.

Can't Stop Now.image_description: Person riding a bike for 10 minutes.

Marathoner.image_description: Person riding a bike next to a statue.

100 Clicks.image_description: A person riding a bike next to a silver "100" sign.

No Big Deal.image_description: A person riding a bike next to a golden "100" sign.

Speed Demon.image_description: An exaggerated illustration of a bike with its front wheel up in the air, and a flame coming out of the back wheel that's touching the ground.

Master Draftsman.description: Draft with another rider for 15 seconds.
Master Draftsman.image_description: Two people riding a bike following each other.

Jelly.image_description: An illustration of a person sitting on the ground with their legs stretched out and wiggly.

Warmed Up.description: Do 5 Volcano Circuit laps in 1 activity.

Hothead.description: Do 10 Volcano Circuit laps in 1 activity.

On Fire!.description: Do 25 Volcano Circuit laps in 1 activity.

Avid Climber.image_description: Ice covered mountain with the text "5x" floating in front of it.

Masochist.image_description: Ice-covered mountain with the text "25x" floating in front of it.

Portal Climber.image_description: An illustration of a person riding up a slope split into colorful sections A large text saying "1x" is floating above.

Climb Portal Pro.image_description: An illustration of a person riding up a slope split into colorful sections A large text saying "10x" is floating above.

Legs of Steel.image_description: An illustration of a person riding up a slope split into colorful sections A large text saying "25x" is floating above.

Hot Off the Line.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a "1 mile" text floating behind them.

First Five.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a "5km" text floating behind them.

Gimme Ten.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a "10 km" text floating behind them.

Runners Dozen.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a "13.1 mile" text floating behind them.

Going the Distance.image_description: Illustration of a person running a marathon.

Centurion.image_description: An illustration of a pair of white Zwift-branded shoes. The laces and the "Z" logo on the side are both orange.

Street Cred.image_description: An illustration of a pair of untied white Zwift-branded shoes. The laces and the "Z" logo on the side are both orange.

Pursuit of Happiness.image_description: An illustration of a pair of town and untied white Zwift-branded shoes. The laces and the "Z" logo on the side are both orange.

Earning the Donuts.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a 9 minute stopwatch floating behind them.

Leg Warmer.image_description: Illustration of a person running with an 8 minute stopwatch floating behind them.

Like the Wind.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a 7 minute stopwatch floating behind them.

Engines are go.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a 6 minute stopwatch floating behind them.

Olympian.image_description: Illustration of a person running with a 5 minute stopwatch floating behind them.

100KPH!.image_description: An illustration of a person riding a bike downhill at a high speed, looking like a meteorite.

Just scrape it.image_description: An illustration of a burnt piece of toast with a sad face jumping out of a toaster.

The blowdrier.image_description: An illustration of a blowdrier with sparkles covering its front where the hot air is coming out of.

Premier power.image_description: An illustration of a large lamp, one that would be used at a theater to light up the performance.

Off the rocks.image_description: An illustration of a lighthouse atop of a cliff, with its light exaggerated.

1.21 gigawatts.image_description: An illustration of a ball of light.

You’re famous.description: You received 30 Ride Ons in one ride
You’re famous.image_description: An illustration of a tired cyclist viwed from behind, with their back covered in "thumbs-up" icons, coming out of their pants.

Going the distance.image_description: An illustration of a person running, with a text saying "26.2" floating behind them.

Olympian.description: You ran a mile in under 5 minutes
Olympian.image_description: An illustration of a person running, with a stopwatch floating behind them and showing 5 minutes elapsed.

Everested!.description: You climed 29,029 ft in one activity
Everested!.image_description: An illustration of a tall mountain with an excessively long, colorful striped flag planted on top and blowing in the wind.

Bigger than Jensie.description: You received 100 Ride Ons in one ride
Bigger than Jensie.image_description: A person lying flat on the ground, covered with "thumbs-up" icons, with only their legs visible.

Liftoff!.description: Climbed Alpe du Zwift in under an hour
Liftoff!.image_description: An illustration of a person riding a bike, with a rocket strapped to their back.

Casse-Pattes.image_description: An S-shaped route graphic connecting a "start" arrow icon in a circle with green background and an orange "finnish" circle at the end of it.
